text: you can spend your whole life for imaging ghost
worrying about the passway of the future
But all there will ever be is what's happening here
and the decision we make in this moment which are based in either love or fear
So many of us choose our path out of fear disguised as practicality
What we really want seems impossibly out of reach
and ridiculous to expect, so we never dear to ask the universe for it
I'm saying, I'm the proof that you can ask the universe for it
My father could be a great comedian, but he didn't believe that was possible for him
so he made a conservative choice
Instead, he got a safe job as a accountant and when I was twelve years old
he was let go from that safe job and our family had to do whatever we could to survive
I've learned many great lessons from my father
not the least of which was that you can fail at what you don't want
so you might as well take a chance on doing what you love
